name: CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions
desc: Type for bookmark data creation options.

items.name: static var minimalBookmarkMask: CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: Specifies that an alias created with the bookmark data be created with minimal information, which may make it smaller but still able to resolve in certain ways.

items.name: static var securityScopeAllowOnlyReadAccess: CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: When combined with the withSecurityScope option, specifies that you want to create a security-scoped bookmark that, when resolved, provides a security-scoped URL allowing read-only access to a file-system resource; for use in an app that adopts App Sandbox.

items.name: static var suitableForBookmarkFile: CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the bookmark data include properties required to create Finder alias files.

items.name: static var withSecurityScope: CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions
items.desc: Specifies that you want to create a security-scoped bookmark that, when resolved, provides a security-scoped URL allowing read/write access to a file-system resource; for use in an app that adopts App Sandbox.
